title: Baby Alice
text:
Baby Alice is a Swedish Eurodance band formed in 2005.


== History ==
From 2005 to 2009, Hanna Adolfsson was the lead singer in the songs while the stage singer was Sandra Gundstedt. They released "Pina Colada Boy" in 2010 under Ultra Records. Natalie Granath took over both vocals and stage performance in 2010.
In 2016, Hanna Adolfsson returned to Baby Alice and they released "Naked". Hanna left the group in 2016 and My HÃ¶glund later joined as the lead vocalist. They released "WOFF",  and later "Ice Cream" as singles in 2020. My Hoglund debuted as the lead singer of these songs, and "WOFF" received 2 million streams when released.


== Discography ==
Singles

"Shake It" (2006)
"Mr. DJ" (2007)
"Pina Colada Boy" (2008)
"Hurricane" (2009)
"Heaven Is a Dancefloor" (2011)
"Old school" (2015)
"S.E.X. Y" (2015)
"One World" (2015)
"Naked" (2016)
"ICE CREAM" (2020)
"WOFF" (2020)
"RAVER" (2023)
